name: Youda Survivor 2
summary:
“Are you ready to make the sacrifice?”  
  
Survive an exotic adventure as you work together with a friendly tribe to find a missing talisman!  
  
Fight off pirates, harness some magic yourself and be the hero.  
  
As you meet exotic creatures, learn new potion recipes and explore caves for hidden treasure, equip yourself with magical tribal marks to improve your chance of survival.  
  
The most dangerous areas of the transformed island will put your survival skills and perseverance to the test like never before.
